title.en: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer (SAKAGUCHI Hisashi)

description.en:
(from fukkan.com):

The Second Reprint of Hisashi Sakaguchi's Famous Work!

The legendary manga adaptation of "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer," one of the most immortal masterpieces of American literature by Hisashi Sakaguchi
has been reprinted in the same style as when it was first published!
Now that you have grown up, go on an adventurous journey once again.

Following "Cleopatra [Complete Edition]" (supervised by Osamu Tezuka, original story) to be published in January 2019, this is the second reprint project of Hisashi Sakaguchi's masterpieces!

The immortal masterpiece "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" needs no further explanation.
In this novel by Mark Twain, the main character Tom Sawyer and his friends, including Huckleberry Finn, go on various adventures in a small town rich in nature on the banks of the Mississippi River.

Did you know that this masterpiece was adapted into a children's manga by Hisashi Sakaguchi?
The original "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" was published in August 1970 as "Masterpiece Manga 1" by Kodansha Ltd.
In this work, the familiar Tom and Huck move around in the story in all directions.
Their movements, given new life by Sakaguchi's fluid touch, are sure to provide both readers who have read the book before and those who are picking it up for the first time with a fresh feeling that is different from that of the printed page.

In this reissue, we are confident that from the beginning to the end of the book, the contents and bookbinding specifications are the same as when the book was first published, and of course, every detail has been faithfully reproduced exactly as it was when it was first published!
In addition, the book will be available only on the fukkan.com website with a special bonus (= an original facsimile of the original drawing provided by the bereaved family of Mr. Hisashi Sakaguchi). Don't miss this rare opportunity!

We hope you will enjoy the world of Hisashi Sakaguchi's version of "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer", which has finally been revived after several decades!

☆☆☆☆Features of this book☆☆☆☆1.
- 1. The first reprint of the manga version of the immortal masterpiece "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer," which was completely adapted by Hisashi Sakaguchi!
- 2. The original manga version with its powerful and weighty expression is also remarkable!
- 3. Beautifully restored with high technology, the entire text of the magazine has been brought back to life.
- 4. Color chapter covers inserted in the text and commentary by Susumu Abe at the end of the book are also reproduced!
- 5. A special reproduction of the original illustration, which was provided by the bereaved family of Mr. Hisashi Sakaguchi, will be presented to those who purchase the book on this website.
